<<<<<<< HEAD
Laura The toyes of a traueller. Or The feast of fancie. Diuided into three parts. By R.T. Gentleman. Tofte, Robert, 1561-1620.
[80] p.
Printed by Valentine Simmes, London : 1597.
R.T. = Robert Tofte. Sonnets. "While 'A frends iust excuse' on E7r asserts over 30 poems are not Tofte's, the statement is prob. false"--STC. Signatures: A-E. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
Laura The toyes of a traueller. Or The feast of fancie. Diuided into three parts. By R.T. Gentleman. Tofte, Robert, 1561-1620.
[80] p.
Printed by Valentine Simmes, London : 1597.
R.T. = Robert Tofte. Sonnets. "While 'A frends iust excuse' on E7r asserts over 30 poems are not Tofte's, the statement is prob. false"--STC. Signatures: A-E. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Valentine Simmes
